title: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971 - Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When performing the 'copy package' operation on package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in the 'jdt.ui3' module, the resulting package 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
EB: The resulting package after performing the 'copy package' operation should be named 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the 'jdt.ui3' module in the IDE.
2. Locate the package 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
3. Perform the 'copy package' operation on the package.
4. Select xxx as the destination.
5. Verify that the resulting package is incorrect and contains a package named 'ui' instead of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
